root.name: Samurai Shodown V Special
root.description: The re-release of Samurai Shodown V addressed many of the problems people had with the original game. Things such as character balance, game dificulty, and player controls got tweaked in this edition. It was the last game officially released for the Neo Geo (further releases have continued by NG:DEV.TEAM)

similar_games.game: Street Fighter II: The World Warrior
